ygData.subject: stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: I m going to answer several posts at one time here to conserve your bandwidth. :)  I hope you can follow: -- thanks for the Cazic maze directions.  Sounds
ygData.messageBody:
I'm going to answer several posts at one time here to conserve your
bandwidth. :) I hope you can follow:

-- thanks for the Cazic maze directions. Sounds freaking scary for now
hehe. I don't like the 75% odds...especially with my slow old legs.
Lim'Dul cannot run like he used to. I think I'll be safe and take the long
route around by way of my own 2 feet heh.

-- AE spells. I've tried playing around with them under the advice I heard
here. Still not working that great for me...I don't know if I'm just not
targetting the right MoB in a fight. Very little damage quite a bit of time
to cast. I'll play with it a bit more.....

-- Leatherskin. I don't leave home without it. :) Yes, expensive as hell.
But I value my hide.


--==Lim'Dul==--
